text: Paula Arnold (; 1885–1968) was an Israeli journalist, botanist, and naturalist. She was noted for her works on the flora and birds of Israel. ==Biography== Paula Kellner (later Arnold) was born in Vienna, Austria. == Published works == * * * * * ==See also== *Women of Israel *Wildlife of Israel == References == ==External links== ** Category:1885 births Category:1968 deaths Category:Israeli women scientists Category:Israeli botanists
title: Paula Arnold
